app.terms.ios: Please see Terms of Use and Privacy Policy for more information. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the expiration date. Account will be charged for renewal at the rate of the selected package within 24 hours before the end of the period. You can go to Settings in your iTunes account to manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Once the purchase is confirmed, the remainder of the free trial will be gone.
app.terms.android: Please see Terms of Use and Privacy Policy for more information. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the expiration date. Account will be charged for renewal at the rate of the selected package within 24 hours before the end of the period. You can go to Settings in your Google Play account to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal. Your Google Play account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Once the purchase is confirmed, the remainder of the free trial will be gone
